solution_line_template: The perimeter of a square is found by {num_sides}*side, which means the square paper has a perimeter of {num_sides}*{side_length} = <<{num_sides}*{side_length}={perimeter}>>{perimeter}

Since the perimeter of the square is {shorter_by} cm shorter than the height of the computer screen, the height of the computer screen is {shorter_by}+{perimeter} = <<{shorter_by}+{perimeter}={height}>>{height}cm.
